title: Composting 101: Turn Kitchen Scraps into Garden Gold

scenes.text: Composting 101: Turn Kitchen Scraps into Garden Gold
scenes.voiceover: Welcome to Nature's Way Soil. Today: Composting 101: Turn Kitchen Scraps into Garden Gold

scenes.text: Master the art of composting with our complete beginner's guide. Learn what to compost, common mistakes to avoid, and how to create nutrient-rich "black gold" for your garden.
